name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Montana's Movie Madness
name_original: Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Montana's Movie Madness
description: Tiny Toon Adventures: Montana's Movie Madness is the second Tiny Toon Adventures game released on the Nintendo Game Boy. It was released in 1993 and was developed and published by Konami. It was released in Japan as Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Buster Bunny no Kattobi Daibouken.
